website_summaries.verdict: This safe, effective and budget-friendly device helps alleviate neck and shoulder pain.
pros: Provides 360° traction to help treat cervical muscle pain, arthritis, and other neck and shoulder issues
Offers a comfortable fit for users of all ages
Has been shown to help improve blood circulation to the cervical spine
Portable design ensures you can bring the device with you just about anywhere
cons: Valve to increase and release pressure sometimes gets stuck

customer_reviews.title: It's addictive.
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor has an expensive machine that does something similar to stretch your neck. He also will manually stretch my neck when I am on the table for a few seconds. I like the decompression, but I am really active and I can't travel to his office last minute. THIS DEVICE (as goofy as it looks) is magically. I seriously feel like I'm floating in air after a minute or less with this. I only need to use it once maybe every 2-3 days. I have started incorporating it into my meditation routine. It just feels nice to have the weight of your head lifted for just a moment.
customer_reviews.author: Quintin Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver. I have a herniated disc in my neck and been dealing with nerve pain for weeks now. I received this traction device and been using it twice a day now. My pain has considerably diminished and only been using it 6 days now. If you suffer from the same issue I highly recommend you get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Pete A

customer_reviews.title: Game changer! Get one!
customer_reviews.text: This neck pillow is a game changer! My boyfriend (the goofy one pictured) and I have constant neck and shoulder pain from our office jobs. This thing is our end of the work day relief, and it works like a charm! We bought one for his mother too, and we all love it! It's kept me from having to pay a chiropractor!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: This works!!
customer_reviews.text: It takes my neck pain away in a short period of time. I know I have degenerative discs and this device takes the pressure off of what is causing my pain. I like it better than the posture pump. I have tried many things but this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Robb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!! I use it for about an hour every few days and it is the only thing that has ever relieved my neck and shoulder pain. I recommend it from all of my heart! Thank you DAVISMART!
customer_reviews.author: Lucian Coman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for neck traction.
customer_reviews.text: High quality material, fits nicely around my average sized neck. It is adjustable for larger or smaller necks. The pump system is easy to use and it expands nicely to provide neck traction. It was even comfy laying back on pillows while watching tv. My c6-7 are herniated and this takes the pressure off so my arm doesn't hurt and tingle. I'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: "i will never take this off"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He mentioned that he wished he could stretch his neck somehow because of the pain in his neck and back. He called me and told me that he will never take it off! He was exaggerating, of course, but he wears it at home almost all the time.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: I had a pinched nerve in my neck. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a pinched nerve in my neck. I had a long road trip to take with my husband. I purchased this product to be able to keep my neck stable in the car. It worked. Our heads are always in a down position. This keeps your head up. You can also pump it up to your comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it says it will!
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. I have degenerative bone disease and a pinched nerve in my neck, and I have bursitis in both shoulders. I have been looking for something just like this device to take the weight and pressure off of my neck muscles, and this device does that. I can’t wear it too long at a time because I get too hot, but that’s not the device’s fault. That’s Menopause😡. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CatalogDiva

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife who has 3 degenerates discs in her neck. It was useless. It is very hard to pump up & it does not hold the air very long no matter how hard I tighten the valve. Don't waste your time or money. I should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Get comfortable with being uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I heard about a device like this from my massage therapist that said it can relieve neck pain by providing traction on the neck separating the discs slightly and relieving pressure on the nerves in the neck. I'm happy to say while i'm wearing it, the pain from my neck and numbness in my right arm is slightly alleviated. The only problem I've had with the product is the stitching on the velcro needs to be moved or made smaller on the device itself so when it's worn the velcro isn't rubbing into your neck. One last issue is the stitching on the outside is popping and coming loose, maybe from too much inflation?
customer_reviews.author: qwerty1

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Doesn’t work. Waste of money Update: customer service was great with which to work. They offered a full refund or replacement. Maybe worth a second try.
customer_reviews.author: Liz W.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING!!! I’ve had severe rheumatoid arthritis for 20 years now. And my neck has been really starting to deteriorate and cause some SEVERE pain over the past couple years. My pain doc sends me to PT but it works for about a couple months and I get tired of living on pain meds and muscle relaxers. The minute I put this on I could feel the stretch down my neck, into my shoulder, and down into my shoulder blade which is where my therapy lady always has to really work on my muscles. Yes all because of the deterioration of my neck vertebrae. This is absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Ethridge

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for neck traction.
customer_reviews.text: This device did not stretch my neck like I thought it would. I pumped it up as much as I could and it was uncomfortable. The chin strap choked me. It might make an ok travel neck pillow or give some support but it did nothing to help me. My kids like pumping it up and plays with it. My husband tried it and said it squeezed his head.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is made to do perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a timely manner and works perfectly to relieve pressure on my herniated disc. I was experiencing symptoms of radiculopathy and the relief that this traction device provided was pretty quick. I'm not saying this is a "cure" (that's impossible with a herniated disc) but definitely provides temporary relief.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenso Eduardo Roman

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Others and Less Than Medical Supply
customer_reviews.text: My doctor prescribed traction and I paid for the over door option. I than purchased a unit just like this from the local medical supply (where i was told I had to go) for $39!!!!. Within a month the unit had tears. This one from DaviSMARt is about half the price and a much better unit than they sell at the medical supply (SAID!) #1 This unit has a longer opening (same width but longer) which allows for the same lift without choking. #2 This has a real valve where the one from the supply has a plastic crimp. #3 the straps are longer. #4 The stitching is better. I could go on but you get the point. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MamaRocks

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve stiffness and compression pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have a chipped disc and stenosis/compression that sometimes causes a migraine and stiff neck. This isn't more uncomfortable than what I've used in PT and I can use it at night, at my leisure, to relieve stiffness and help ward off a migraine.
customer_reviews.author: Dianalynn

customer_reviews.title: Alleviates neck/shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: Wearing this device really alleviated my neck pain - and it was incredibly convenient not to be anchored to one spot. I had a query and the company got back to me immediately.
customer_reviews.author: sara21

customer_reviews.title: Great device once I understood that the metal valve needs to be closed
customer_reviews.text: “Text neck” from using my mobile devices caused pinched nerve with pain extending down my shoulder and upper arm. The only instant relief was neck traction with ice afterwards. I had a similar 3-pillow device previously but it did not have a valve and did not hold its shape for long. DaviSMART does retain its shape when inflated if the metal valve instructions were followed. Instructions were at the back of the sheet. Closing the metal valve after inflating should be part of the instruction steps for use. This is a great device once I understood that the metal valve needs to be closed. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: JMsf

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for cervical radiculopathy!
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped me get through some hard days here lately with my neck and tingling, burning left arm. It's soft and fits comfortably--not at all scary to me (like the over the door, weighted contraptions). The FREE mask was so comfortable i allowed my nephew to take it back to college with him. He's in a suite with 3 roommates. How could i not? Finally, great customer service who just sent me an email to ask if i received my product ok and offered to correct any issues. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.

customer_reviews.title: helpful for my nerve in my neck
customer_reviews.text: I had whiplash 25 years ago. I am now experiencing the feeling of a pinched nerve in my neck. This does seem to relieve that pressure so that's worth it's weight in gold. But that cord is a little tricky; just pumping it doesn't do it alone sometimes I also have to hold the hose near that little round ball to get it to pump up quickly. Otherwise i can hear a little air escaping. Note: this thing also works great on the airplane, to keep my head from bobbing when I fall asleep
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: The device is probably great for most people
customer_reviews.text: The device is probably great for most people. It appears to be well-made and functions as advertised. The problem I have with it is this. When the device is inflated it presses down on my trap muscle that goes across my shoulder and when it does, it sends pain into a spot in my upper back on the same side as the tender trap muscle. If this were not a problem, I think the device would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Morris

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing for my neck muscles
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to support my neck while I watched tv and used my phone, because one sided neck pain was too much! This seemed like it would help and it does! I wear it about 30 minutes at a time twice a night, it would uncomfortable to wear beyond that for me. But my neck feels great relief due to this so I’m very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nick DiRamio

customer_reviews.title: It will give you the support you're looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I made this purchase. It's a little cumbersome around your ears depending on how much you pump it up, but it definitely provides more support than any other brace that I've purchased recently while I nurse a neck and back injury. Overall it's very comfortable!! My only complaints are it makes you sweat a little bit around your neck, and the pump can get in the way a little bit. With that being said, I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scully it's me

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to receive my traction collar, and felt a bit of relief after the very first time using it, however I did run into an issue on my first use. The device lost air, very slowly, and required a semi-constant pumping to stay inflated enough to stretch my neck. I contacted the seller and they sent out a new collar immediately. Problems happen, particularly with inflatable items, but the response from customer service was swift and satisfying. You really can't ask for much more.
customer_reviews.author: Lockespop

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Recommended by my physical therapist
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist recommended this for reducing neck pain. It really helps relax my neck. I use it twice a day. But the unexpected benefit is it works great as a travel pillow. Leaning my head to one side while I'm asleep in the car causes me to have severe pain later. I have bought several travel pillows (the one whose name I recall is Turtle pillow), but they only support on one side. So if I lean my head to the other side while I'm asleep, I wake up with severe pain. Now I use the DaviSMART cervical neck traction device while traveling, and it supports my head in any position. I wake up pain free!
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: It Stretches Sooo Good!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it when it showed up. It took about 4 sessions of 20 minutes each to really get a feel for the effect. It's helped to relieve a good portion of the neck pain I had.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this product. I think it may help with the stretching of the muscles but can’t get over feeling choked.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if your into choking.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this device I know what it’s like to be choked out. I suppose if your into autoerotic asphyxiation this could be useful. It feels like being put into a headlock by the Michelin man. My neck sure feels better though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, made well, and finally some relief.
customer_reviews.text: I have had neck stiffness and pain for years. Lately my head just feels like it weighs a hundred pounds. I have admittedly terrible posture at work in front of the computer and using this a few times away just relaxes my neck and shoulders to take the pressure away. I’ve had this a week, so I’m not completely healed but any improvement at all is such a relief to me. I’m looking forward to seeing more improvement in the weeks to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My New Neck Traction Device
customer_reviews.text: I have tried six different devices from soft collars to complicated rigid devices. The Davi SMART Cervical Neck Traction device is the most comfortable fitting and easy to operate device yet. I'm not looking any further for a device that offers any more features, because the Davi SMART does what I need it to do. I can stay in it longer to get the proper muscle stretch I need to reduce pain. I can even wear it on an airplane...it works better than my neck pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Jef L Harris

customer_reviews.title: Better than the one the clinic gives you
customer_reviews.text: Better than the one the clinic gives you. The one the PT clinic provides is the old, highly mechanical, heavy, awkward, metal and plastic cervical traction unit (last time I slipped a disc). I was hesitant about this one because it seemed flimsy from the pictures. It is EXORBITANTLY BETTER. It really stretches you out, and you can even wear it walking around. Thank you for making this product and making it so affordable! Relief!
customer_reviews.author: Tour NewEnglander

customer_reviews.title: Great Expansion
customer_reviews.text: We have been using devices like this daily for about five years. They have to be replaced periodically. We just tried this product and it really expands more than the previous purchases. Since the two of us are very different in size, that makes this more versatile. We have not had it long enough to address durability but it seems on par with previous purchases that have lasted about two years.
customer_reviews.author: mts

customer_reviews.title: It hurts my chin, so I'm reluctant to use it
customer_reviews.text: With the DaviSMART Cervical Neck Traction system, I feel like all the pressure is on my chin, and it's uncomfortable. On the Pettibon Cervical Neck Traction system, I feel relief instantly. With the DaviSMART, I'm not sure I feel relief at all, or if I do, it's drowned out by the discomfort on my chin. However, I've only used the Pettibon at my chiropractor's office, and I don't know how to set one up at home so for now I'm stuck with using the high bolster side of my contoured foam pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it on and off and so far it is definitely helping. While my pain is rather chronic and it is due to years and years of unhealthy way of sitting at work, it is definitely reducing when I use it more regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Firas

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The cervical neck traction was an answer to my prayers it reduced the pain and pressure in my neck and gave me relief from my headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C Blue

customer_reviews.title: Relieves the pain /fatigue
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to lie, I bought this thinking I would not use it much. I use it a lot because it does give me relief from the fatigue and pai n holding up my head for long periods of time after the car accident aggravated the bulging disks in my neck. It pretty easily adjusted. Sometimes I forget I have it on ( I wore it frequently during a recent road trip). I just hope I have already worn it out...it has been deflating a bit, but I should check the valve on the pump to make sure air is not leaking out thru it if it's not tightly closed.
customer_reviews.author: dnvsierravista

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Works a promised
customer_reviews.text: Initial reaction to this product is very positive. It arrived as promised and appears to be of high quality. I have used it and it appears to be helping. However, I must reserve final judgement since in all honesty it is hard for me to see how this device can be as effective as a cervical stretching device as the old style sand/water in the bag and pulley contraption did. That said, I have great hopes since this product is much easier, more convenient and more comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: DJG

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to inflate
customer_reviews.text: It’s too early to tell if this device is helping or not. I’ve used it only 3 or 4 times, but only after a long time of pumping. It never seems to get very firm. Once it’s inflated, it pushes up the back of the head, but does little to lift the front. The material is soft and does not irritate. I do not deflate the device to remove it, but still need to repump it in order to reuse it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Goodell

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this device if your neck gets stiff from various causes...
customer_reviews.text: Item works as described. I only gave 4 stars because to inflate from flat to expansion takes quite a bit of squeezes of the bulb that inflates the device. I have only used it a few times so I can't speak of it's longevity. I just hope the velcro holds up that attaches one side of the neck device to the other. There are two straps (Top & Bottom). I do recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerDave

customer_reviews.title: The only way to get relief...
customer_reviews.text: I have a moderately bad neck from years of abuse and snowboarding crashes. It has left me with several herniated disks (c3-c4, c4-c5, c5-c6) in my neck, which if you've experienced this - it's quite painful. On my bad days, this device is literally what gets me through the pain. More than any medication or PT exercise, this traction device gets me to the other side. It's obviously not a permanent fix, but it gives me relief when I need it the most. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Snoblitz

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but not for those with larger necks.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy with a big head and a big neck. I bought this to help relieve some tension and pressure in my neck and upper back. It works fine, but because my neck is much larger in diameter than the model pictured with the product, I couldn't really inflate it enough to where I needed it to be without making myself feel like I was being choked. Nothing that's the fault of the product by any means, but definitely worth considering if your body doesn't fit the "average size" or "fits most people" mold. Still a good product though.
customer_reviews.author: A Branch

customer_reviews.title: Not a traction devicr
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired physical therapist. I also have cervical arthritis and thought I would try this product. This device does not provide cervical traction. The average adult head weighs 10 pounds and a traction device must be able to produce at least that much force to actually begin to separate the vertebrae. This device is not able by its design to put force on the proper areas of the skull to produce a traction effect. If you want an inflatable cervical collar that holds your head in place, then this will do that.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and is pretty comfortable as well. Could it be more comfortable? Yes, but not for this price. And it is really quite comfortable as it is. I use it a lot. Sitting on couch watching TV.... No Problem. I even use it as I am driving! Still quite comfortable. It does lose air as you sit, so ever now and again you have to squeeze the ball a couple times to keep the pressure up. I find that using this does help to keep my pain level low. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: Once I used this traction device twice a day it really made a huge difference. The moderately severe neck pain and discomfort are gone - I still have mild discomfort but I've had that for decades. We'll see if that gets better after longer use. The first device I received leaked a bit and I had to almost constantly add air, but the seller sent me a new one for free (did not have to return defective one) and it is much better. I'm a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short-Term Relief
customer_reviews.text: When you're in sure need of immediate relief from neck pain that prevents or restricts your lateral range of motion and you can't get to a chiropractor, this could provide you with much needed immediate relief. Note that when this inflates, it constricts blood and air flow so if you're a nervous person, this could be a deal breaker. In summary, I recommend this for healthy people and for short term use only. Regards, DG
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: A truly awesome way to suffocate...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my wife's neck pain. So I figured I should try it out. I placed it around my neck per the instructions and commenced to inflate the thing. After a short while, I noticed that it wasn't really stretching my neck so I kept going and soon my head felt light and fuzzy. As I struggled to breathe, I dropped the pumpy thing and couldn't look around to find it. I finally was able to swing my head enough to hit my dog in the head and he ripped the pumpy thing off relieving the pressure. It seems a great way to self suffocate...if you're into that like David Carradine was.
customer_reviews.author: elikdinmon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as i expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as i expected ,,very comfortable and durable and perfect for reading on bed or watching movies or for long distance travel ,,thanx to manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Ali Jafar Al Moamen

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on-time and was as advertised. Construction seems fine and it works as advertised. Previous reviews said it was uncomfortable.. Well when you are wearing a device constructed to stretch your neck what do you expect. Its a bit tight and does sometimes feel like its choking you a bit ..... However if you want to separate vertebrae you will need to deal with a bit of discomfort. I have been using it for a few days now and do believe I am having some relief of pain. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: kevin crutchley

customer_reviews.title: Just had to try it.
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my neck & spondylosis so I was skeptical of this when I first saw it but when my Dr recommended I get a device similar to this but that one would've cost me out of pocket over $300 I decided to try this & I'm extremely glad I did. It is light weight & surprisingly comfortable (unlike the neck pillow I had been using). I highly recommend it. I'm extremely glad I decided to try it... 😁
customer_reviews.author: Pam C.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the second cervical traction device to give to another person with my same symptoms
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have several cervical disc problems and since using it the pain has improved 75%-90%. When I work outside and garden I know to expect some discomfort. The neurosurgeon said to keep using it 3-4 times a day after these type activities. I do as he instructed and feel much better in no time. The device is constructed well and easy to use. The person I gave it to is also experiencing relief. It truly is a life saver for me and her as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: convenient to use wherever you are.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can work at my desk while using Davis mart cervical inflation device. Many of the others required you to lay down or sit up near a door. This is more convenient for me. I have just used it for a week but the knots in my neck have gone away and my headaches have lessened. We'll see how it works long term but at this point the device holds pressure and is comfortable on my neck and chin. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Dinwiddie

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure!
customer_reviews.text: I am torn on this product. I think it would relieve pain for resting if only two rings instead of three. I know it is more for stretching the neck but I was looking for comfort so I could sleep with my 2 bothersome collapsed discs. It is just a bit large for that and I don't find it comfortable enough. I want to return it but so badly want it to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: LaDawn's Art and Crafts

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. It really helps
customer_reviews.text: It really helps my wonky neck feel much better, and it's super easy to use. Company is very responsive and followed up with an email because they've experienced some shipping problems. A responsive proactive company is very important to me and DaviSART is great.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just wasn't right for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product. Material is comfortable. It's easy to inflate. Velcro is strong. I had bought it for my 95yo mother who has severe cervical pain due to crown dens syndrome. I was hopeful it would relieve it. Sadly her condition isn't susceptible to the collar's pain relieving ability. I recommend this product, though. The seller communicated with me to make sure product was received and ask if I had any concerns. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: dawtravelbug

customer_reviews.title: Fair price and decent product
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a decent product for the price. The problem is with my neck, not this item. I believe someone looking for something to take the weight of their big head off of their neck will think this is worth the price. It will not cure spinal stenosis with myelopathy. As it is not very expensive, and it seems to hold up, I think it is worth the price. It is a good place to start to see if this kind of device will provide a benefit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie James Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Relief from pinched nerve!
customer_reviews.text: I was experiencing severe pain from cervical radiculopathy and couldn't get a PT appointment for several weeks, so I thought I'd try the DaviSMART Cervical Neck Traction device. It has helped immensely. Now I can cut back the ibuprofen and hang on until my PT appointment. Relief is so welcome. It's easy to use and comfortable. Inflates and deflates easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this a few days and I’m already so happy I bought it. It may not cure all neck and upper back pain and fatigue, but it certainly helps give some relief. It assists me in correcting my posture in a way that my entire body feels (and moves) better. Hopefully the more I use it, the more trained I’ll become to adopt this corrected posture at all times even without this device.
customer_reviews.author: hallblack

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The Velcro straps could use an update as mine have come undone a couple of times during use. Probably better for people with necks 18 inches or less in circumference. I spend a ton of time using a computer and noticed an improvement after the 3rd usage.
customer_reviews.author: D.Xerxes

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize it would be such good quality!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the collar, my expectations were not very high. For the price, I expected a cheap, plastic device that might not work very well or stand up to use. In actuality, the collar is of very good quality. It is covered in a nice, soft fabric and it fastens well. The collar works great and I have used it several times in just the past week. I think it is great and now I can't believe it was so inexpensive!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E Broussard

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. It worked after first use and it did an outstanding job then after trying it a 2nd time it began leaking air and wouldn’t inflate properly. I returned the item for a new on and the same exact thing happened. I ordered the khaki colored one and both were defective so maybe it’s different ones that work better than others. The first delivery and replacement delivery was excellent I just wish the product worked.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good neck supporter
customer_reviews.text: I got neck pain due to military neck, it seems my neck muscles are not strong enough to hold the weight. It helped me to heal the muscles. I used it during the day, to hold my neck straight, and avoid the load on the neck bones. A good traction pillow, comfortable to use. My only complaint is the air pump is loose, it started falling off after a week of use, I glued it with permanent glue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I must have gotten one that malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: I started out loving it but after a very short period of time mine started loosing air. I'm very disappointed because I threw the box away and now I can't send it back. Otherwise it works as long as it stays inflated. : (
customer_reviews.author: linda v

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use seems durable so far. Only have had 1 day
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, easy to use, seems like with gentle use it should hold up. I have cervical herniation and degeneration with frequent headaches. Package arrived as a headache was coming on popped this on for 30 minutes and it was great. I do have TMJ so had to remember to keep jaw relaxed or keep my tongue thrusted. Might try the mouth guard like another user suggested
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality and great service!
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded all of my expectations! I have cervical spinal stenosis (severe) and I use the devise everyday for 10 minutes as I was instructed as PT. Shipping was quick and on time with no hassel. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Love

customer_reviews.title: It works, but could be a better design.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with one design flaw. The Velcro straps. They are oriented so that when the device is inflated it pushes the velcro apart. If these had been installed on the outside of the device rather than inverted in the bellows this would not happen. The function of the device is sound. It lifts the head albeit with a bit of neck constriction. Just be careful to stop inflating when you begin to feel pressure IN your head.
customer_reviews.author: Thorfinn

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for arthritis or neck spasms
customer_reviews.text: I used this traction device to treat my neck muscle spasms and arthritis. The price was much less than the other one I own, which requires lying down while using it. I REALLY like that I can walk around while using this one. It’s soft and very comfortable to wear. The pumping mechanism is easy to use. I haven’t had any air leaks. The release valve, however, is unusual and awkward to use. Overall, I think it’s a solid and useful device.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Works OK but could use improvements to design
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter that has reverse curve in her neck and a pinched nerve. The pump bulb needs to be barbed where the hose attaches because it comes off the tube VERY EASILY while trying to pump it up. The ball bearing valve inside the tube can be a pain to move back and forth. Daughter stated it helped a little with relieving the pinch on her nerve - pain level 9 before and maybe a 6 with the neck traction inflated all the way. Works OK but upgrades to the above mentioned parts would help a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Granny D

customer_reviews.title: Good product may not work for thinner people.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Cheap and really helped my neck. It must be made for really big folks. I am 190 pounds and it barely fits my neck, I have to adjust it to where it barely fits the Velcro. If I was bigger, maybe 220-250, it would fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard D Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with awesome results!
customer_reviews.text: I have degenerative disc disease that causes me pain 24/7. I have limited range of motion when I turn my head as well as radiculopathy down both arms. After I use this, all of that is improved and there is less “crunchiness” in my neck after. During use, I can feel some pulling pains in my shoulder blades as they are being pulled back into their proper position while wearing this. Granted, the relief is temporary but if used several times a day as instructed, I’m definitely more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RanRob

customer_reviews.title: The best Cervical neck traction
customer_reviews.text: Our chiropractor recommended this product and we love It. So easy to use and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Penny McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Neck Pain Reliever
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you inflate the device, you can feel the traction. It takes some minor adjustments to not feel like you're going to be choked out, but I think this device will definitely help my neck pain from degenerative arthritis in the long term.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome relief
customer_reviews.text: So I went back and forth with buying this for my boyfriend. He has bad neck pain everyday and will not go to a doctor. I got it to try it out and hoped for the best. He absolutely loves it. He said the pressure is taken off his neck and head which in turn helps his headaches. The pull you feel on top of your shoulders feels amazing . Yes you look stupid doing it, but it’s well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Neck Traction or Hand Exercise Device?
customer_reviews.text: A great hand-exercise device as you constantly have to hand pump the squeeze bulb to keep it inflated! All kidding aside, it appears to be well made and it is a comfortable neck traction device--but it leaks rapidly even with the relief valve nut completely tightened. It comes with a card that extends an invitation to contact DaviSmart by email if it leaks, so this must be a common problem. I have written the inevitable email and am awaiting a response. At $15.00, it isn't worth the effort to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce G

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about it
customer_reviews.text: I feel I get more relief, from a traction unit that goes into my door jam and my head rests in it.. off floor. This device may be better for airplane travel to keep neck up when trying to sleep.. cannot get comfortable with it, seems too big at times.. or too tight.. not really feeling neck relief with it.. worried maybe doing more bad than good.
customer_reviews.author: pamela6000

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay inflated. Doesn't work as described.
customer_reviews.text: I experienced no relief from neck pain and the air escapes within a few minutes. I followed the instructions. I moved the internal valve ball- bearing to block air from escaping. This helps a little but air is escaping elsewhere on the unit so I am unable to experience any benefit. I can't keep air in the device longer than a few minutes. Good looking unit and comfortable if only for a few minutes
customer_reviews.author: JNLA

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist suggested I get a traction devise for my neck arthritis. It has proven to do what it was designed to do. If you think you need something stronger and more automatic check out the $200.00 to $500.00 section. It will take around 40 to 50 pumps, depending on the pressure you like, but I can use the exercise. I think some of the negative reviews may have been due to lack of following directions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good !!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried for first time yesterday and the product provided immediate neck relief and my neck felt much more relaxed after the initial 20 minute session. I'm anxious to use a few times per day (as recommended) towards providing relief to a chronic neck strain issue that has not been helped through chiropractic (or even acupuncture as a last resort). I purchased this at the recommendation of a friend who is a physical therapist (he suspects I have a pinched nerve in my neck) and am hoping this THIS is the answer to relieving my neck pain/strain. Super easy to use and well constructed although it does get very warm after about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: What's amazing is how much better it felt
customer_reviews.text: The Solution for chronic neck pain is changing the number and softness of the pillows you sleep on at night. You might need two, three, none., Whatever. This is the ONLY way to relieve this in the long term However, this inflatable device did allow me to work while in pain. I can't say that it made it much less but it did hold my head steady so that muscle wasn't zapping me every 10 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived promptly, and in the first day, I noticed a significant decrease in my shoulder tension and signicantly better sleep. I’ve been using for nearly a week now, and the years long pain I’ve had in my shoulders is nearly gone. Can’t recommend enough. I
customer_reviews.author: SarahG

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try!!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually helps. I have massive trap knots which cause bad headaches that over the counter meds don’t touch. I get massages regularly but find that I have to do more to keep those muscles relaxed. I’ve used this twice a day for a few days so far and I think it’s helping a bit. My range of motion is slightly better. Will keep using!! Didn’t give 5 because I haven’t had it long enough.
customer_reviews.author: MiLo

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have serious arthritis in my neck. This device, in combination with physical therapy, has provided immediate relief. Unlike many other neck traction devices, it is light weight and very comfortable. Will be great for travel. Also very easy to use. And you can sit in a chair rather than having to lie down on the floor, which is required for many larger devices. And there is no need to load gallons of water, which is required in other devices. Would buy it again - no question. My physical therapist was very impressed by the device.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works great and well made
customer_reviews.text: I have been having neck problems for the past few months and decided to discuss it with my doctor. She recommended I get a cervical traction pillow to help alleviate my discomfort. I found the DaviSMART product on Amazon, ordered it, and received it very quickly. I'm really happy with it. I set my timer for 20 minutes each time I use it. It is so comfortable that it is common for me to actually take a nap while using it. Although I have only been using it for a few days, my neck is feeling better and I'm looking forward to further improvement.
customer_reviews.author: GloGreen

customer_reviews.title: Choking Hazard
customer_reviews.text: My personal experience with this device wasn't good and I had to return it. In order to feel like I was getting any relief (very little) from it, I had to inflate it so much that I felt like I was in choke hold. It literally was cutting circulation off. Rather than pass out from blood loss to the brain in search of some relief, I decided this just wasn't for me. It could just be that it wasn't a good fit for me. I'm 5'8" 185 lbs, muscular build, 18 inch neck. Could be a good product, but maybe not a good fit if you have a similar build to me. Return process was simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Powerlifter

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleeping in an upright position!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the hope that it would relieve a pinched nerve in my neck. I've used it a couple of times now and it has helped with my neck but I've also noticed that it has also helped with my afternoon naps ;)
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well. Easy on/off and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: I had tried ordering some neck relief devices before, that never worked. Was skeptical on this one, but that soon passed on the first time I wore it. My wife and I both have neck pain from car accidents and this device works great to offer relief. We wear it while riding in the car or while on a conference call or around the house. Nice to give my head/neck a break and happy this works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Okerholm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: For a relatively low price tag of around $15, I had expected something on the lower end in terms of quality. However, I was surprised to see that the device was nicely made, of strong quality materials and performed better than expected. It fits comfortably around my neck, is secured with velcro straps, and then inflates gradually and easily to apply increasing pressure under the chin, jaw and back of the head: exactly where needed to subtly ease pressure on the cervical spine. Not sure it is doing precisely what a medically traction device does, but it seems to relieve neck and shoulder pain after a few minutes of use. Well worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cervical Neck Traction Device
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the Collar Brace. I have a problem with my cervical neck and my right shoulder has been in pain for awhile and the Collar Brace helps it quite a bit. The Doctors wanted to operate, but I didn't want to do this. I have had two operations on my back already because of Spinal Stenosis.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Chiarello

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Recently I've had a lot of pain in my neck to the point where any turning my head was very painful. I saw this on one of those "great things on Amazon" list and after reading the review I decided to get it. It arrived the next day. I used it laying down and inflated it to a good "stretch". As the stretch would feel less intense I would add a pump or two. I did this for about 20-30 minutes and afterwards my neck definitely felt less stiff and painful. I could turn my head a bit farther in all directions. I've been using it a couple times a day and it had definitely helped quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, effective, EXCELLENT customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this to "reverse" the effects of my desk job, and have noticed a considerable difference. I put it on for 20 minutes or so when I get home and it helps create space in my neck, relieving nerve pain I've been experiencing. I bought this, skeptically, on recommendation from a PT, and it has been magic. Plus the customer service from DaviSmart has been excellent. I really appreciated the follow up to make sure I was happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen P

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Product works well for me (average framed female). I like the adjustability of this, as opposed to the simple foam collars that eventually squish down. It is convenient that the inflating bulb and tube can be detached so you don't have to walk around with that hanging from your neck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Herniated Disc Relief finally!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. My husband has 2 herniated discs in his neck. After he uses this device, he feels so much relief. We've spent a lot of money and time looking for relief. I wish we had found this before. This is so incredibly affordable for the same relief you get from far more expensive devices. We highly recommend this for anyone suffering from the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 things not great about this product: 1) The item loses air between use (when using twice daily). It's does not inflate all the way, but you need to pump it a few times to inflate back to the desired level. 2) The velcro fastening around your throat are quite uncomfortable. While both things are secondary, maybe the manufacturer can fix them.
customer_reviews.author: yehuda

customer_reviews.title: Best one I have found but leaked
customer_reviews.text: Leaked after only a few uses. Otherwise fit better than most
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful device, it effectively stretches neck structures and decompressed my disc
customer_reviews.text: The device started me on the road to recovery. I developed a herniated cervical disc. I was getting horrible pain and tingling down my right arm. The pain in my neck, upper back, and arm were so bad that I couldn’t sleep for days. Thankfully I found this device and upon the very first use, I began to feel some relief.
customer_reviews.author: Percivel

customer_reviews.title: works great! I
customer_reviews.text: works great! I, can feel a different when I use it and after. I put it on while watch tv for about 15 minutes, take it off let my neck rest and it feels great. I found also, while I am wearing I am relaxed more which relieves the tension in my neck and shoulders and allows this to work more efficiently. I have only had it a few weeks, but so far good. no leaks, hope it continues to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline K. Van Ginkel

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but low quality
customer_reviews.text: This was suggested to me by my PT guy. I ordered it, but was disappointed. It is of light construction and not able to provide the neck traction that the PT guy was hoping for. In addition, it arrived with a slight leak, and does not hold inflation. I could continually pump, but that seems a bit silly to me. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: KI

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The product and packaging were very nicely done quality-made. I chose this over others for the slimmer look - the thought being that the pressure would be more focused on raising the neck and less clumsy. And the actual product was just as expected in that sense. More importantly, my biggest fear was that this would be uncomfortable, painful, or give me a choking feeling. But not at all. I have it on right now while typing this review on my desktop. You look funny wearing it, but it is super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: more pain than relief
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. This collar squished my jaw into my head and practically cut off my breathing. It basically pushed my head in a forward position, instead of raising it up, making the pain worse.
customer_reviews.author: Anna O.

customer_reviews.title: It worked great! (Sidenote
customer_reviews.text: This neck brace came in very handy just the day after it arrived. My son landed on his head on an airbag and hyperextended his neck. I brought the brace and put it around his neck and inflated it til it supported his neck until we got to the ER. It worked great! (Sidenote: he was fine 😅)
customer_reviews.author: G Burbidge

product_meta.title: Cervical Neck Traction Device by DaviSmart, Inflatable Collar Brace, Adjustable Neck Stretcher, Neck Support, Ideal for Spine Alignment and Chronic Neck Pain Relief + Eye Mask (Gray)
feature_bullets: It CORRECTS POSTURE and RELIEVES PAIN in the NECK and shoulders by providing 360 ° traction, it helps with Chronic Neck, Arthritis, herniated, bulging disc, tension, cervical muscle spasms, Spine Alignment.

EYE MASK and VIDEO EXERCISES BONUS - 5 Easy & Effective Exercises for Neck pain relief. Will help strengthen the muscles in your neck as well as relieve existing neck pain, Chronic Neck and Shoulder pain.
VERY EASY TO USE and COMFORTABLE TO WEAR: it doesn't require any assembly and is completely portable. You can easily take it anywhere and use it at the office or while traveling.
INCREASES BLOOD CIRCULATION to the structures of the cervical spine, helping to oxygenate muscles, nerves, tendons, thus decreasing pain and promoting relaxation. RELIABLE HOME TREATMENT.
YOU WILL GET: 1pc Cervical Neck Traction Device, 1pc Eye Mask, User Manual and access to download the Video Bonus - 5 Easy & Effective Exercise for Neck Pain Relief.
